name: SDL Game
description:
SDL game was my first time using SDL to create a game engine and to create a functioning game for university. Throughout my creation and learning of this game, I created a game that captured the required aspects of a set brief. From this, over the coming summer, I wish to recreate a game in SDL but create something interesting and experimental out of what i have learned.

Note : this game does not have mouse input in it, please use the arrow keys and enter to navigate around the menu.
